quests.name: Cinderella's Custom Creation
objectives: Recruit Daisy for Cinderella's project.
Meet Daisy and friends at the Boutique.
Talk to Daisy.

Take pictures to inspire Cinderella:
  ‧ Sunbirds
  ‧ White & Red Hydrangea.
  ‧ Citrine.
Go to Daisy's Boutique to meet with Cinderella and friends.
Talk to Cinderella.

Gather materials for making Cinderella's Divider Base:
  ‧ 15 Softwood.
  ‧ 5 Gold Ingot.
  ‧ 2 Sapphire.
Craft the Divider Base for Cinderella.
Meet Cinderella at her House.
Make sure you have the Divider Base in your Inventory.
Give Cinderella the Divider Base.
Talk to Jasmine about the magic of colors.

Gather the Ingredients to cook Purple Dye.
  ‧ Canola.
  ‧ Blueberry.
  ‧ Raspberry.
  ‧ Squid.
  ‧ Purple Pigment.
Cook the Ingredients together to make Purple Dye.
Be sure to have the Purple and Yellow Dyes in your Inventory.
Bring the dyes and chat with Daisy about fabric.
Ask Minnie Mouse for a finishing touch for Cinderella's project.
Return to Cinderella's House.
Give Cinderella the dyed fabrics.
Purple Fabric.
Yellow Fabric.
Add Minnie's Cute Ribbon to Cinderella's Room Divider Screen.
The Room Divider Screen is complete! Take a group photo to remember this moment.
Some kind of weird fabric just appeared. Pick it up!
Talk with Cinderella.

quests.name: Critter Chaos
objectives: Ask for Alice's help.
Update Cinderella on the tool thief.
Visit Cinerella's home.
Try to negotiate with Rude Raccoon.
Check in with Alice.

Gather the Ingredients for a Whimsical Pie:
  ‧ Sugarcane.
  ‧ Wheat.
  ‧ Whimsical Berries.
Cook a Whimsical Pie.
Return to Cinerella's home.
Make sure you have Whimsical Pie in your Inventory.
Give the Whimsical Pie to the Rude Raccoon.
Make sure you have Cinderella's Hammer with you.
Discuss the remaining last tools with Cinderella.
Ask Cheshire Cat for clues.
Find Cinderella's Thread with an unusual turtle on Dazzle Beach.
Fish Cinderella's Pencil out of the water in the Glade of Trust.
Cinderella's Thread.
Cinderella's Pencil.
Give Cinderella back her tools.
Place the tea party set on Dazzle Beach.
Have a tea party with Cinderella and Alice.
Pick up the White Buttons that just appeared on Dazzle Beach.
Chat with Cinderella about the buttons you just found.

quests.name: A Dream Come True
objectives: Meet the Fairy Godmother in her House
Talk with The Fairy Godmother.
Pick up the Instant Photos in the Fairy Godmother's House.
Discuss your findings with The Fairy Godmother.
Meet the Fairy Godmother in Cinderella's House.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother in Cinderella's House.
Gather 12 Gold Nuggets for buttons with Mushu.

Gather flowers with Mickey for dye:
  ‧ 6 White Impatiens.
  ‧ 4 White Passion Lily.

Gather Gems with Aladdin for sparkle:
  ‧ 2 Amethyst.
  ‧ 2 Aquamarine.
  ‧ 2 Diamond.
  ‧ 2 Emerald.

Ensure you have all the fabric components for Cinderella in your Inventory.
  ‧ Show Cinderella the Mysterious Fabric Scrap and White Buttons.
  ‧ Mysterious Fabric Scrap.
  ‧ White Buttons.
Craft the Coat of Companionship.
Try on the Coat of Companionship.
Talk to Cinderella.
Take a picture with Cinderella in your Coat of Companionship.
Talk with Cinderella.

quests.name: The Friendship Ball
objectives: Talk to Lumiere.
Talk to Jasmine about decorations for the Friendship Ball.
Trade 8,000 Star Coins with Scrooge McDuck for all the decoration supplies you need.
Gather 8,000 Star Coins with Scrooge McDuck for all the decoration supplies you need.
Bring the following items for Jasmine.

(Optional) Gather the following items for Jasmine.
  ‧ 20 Stone.
  ‧ 15 Softwood.
  ‧ 15 Cotton.
  ‧ 5 Dark Wood.
  ‧ 5 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 4 Citrine.
  ‧ 4 Ruby.
  ‧ 4 Sapphire.
Talk to Remy about food and drink for the Friendship Ball.

Gather Ingredients for the Friendship Ball menu:
  ‧ 15 Apples.
  ‧ 10 Sugarcane.
  ‧ 8 Pumpkin.
  ‧ 7 Corn.
  ‧ 7 Bell Pepper.
  ‧ 7 Lettuce.
  ‧ 7 Cucumber.
Bring the Ingredients to Remy.
Talk to Belle.
Meet Cinderella in her House for final preparations for the Friendship Ball.
Surprise! Fairy Godmother is here. Talk to Cinderella.

It's time to dress up for the Friendship Ball. Dress up in:
  ‧ The Coat of Companionship.
  ‧ Any inner shirt.
  ‧ Any Formal pants or skirt.
Attend the Friendship Ball in the Dream Castle.
Talk with Cinderella in the Dream Castle.

Enjoy the Friendship Ball in the Dream Castle.
  ‧ Chat with the chefs at the Friendship Ball.
Enjoy the Friendship Ball in the Dream Castle.
Grab a cup of Dream Fizz from the punch table and enjoy it.

Bring a glass of Dream Fizz to Cinderella, Merlin, and the Fairy Godmother.
  ‧ Cinderella.
  ‧ The Fairy Godmother.
  ‧ Merlin.
Take some selfies on the dance floor inside the main entrance to the Dream Castle
Talk to Cinderella when you're ready to call it a night.
Exit the Dream Castle to end the Friendship Ball.
Meet Cinderella near the Wishing Well in the Plaza.
Talk to Cinderella.
